Header: HKSAR Legislative Council rejects motion to impeach Carrie Lam
Content: The Legislative Council of Chinaâ€™s Hong Kong Special Administrative Region rejected the motion proposed by pan-democratic lawmakers to impeach Chief Executive Carrie Lam. A statement released by the Legislative Council said the motion failed to garner a majority of votes from functional constituencies. HKSAR Chief Secretary for Administration Cheung Kin-chung said that the chief executive has done nothing illegal or committed dereliction of duty. Cheung also urged the pan-democratic lawmakers to ensure the ceasing of all violent acts and let the city recover as soon as possible.
